summary: This mod adds a new lore friendly armor set for both genders with 20+ items to mix and match with upgraded alternate textures.
descriptionHtml:
[font=century gothic][color=Red][u][b][size=+3]EotW Dovahkiins Journeyman Armor V2[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MTlbCETl.jpg[/IMG]


[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]About this Mod[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]
Here it is - a brand new version of my popular [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/44592]EotW Dovahkiins Journeyman Armor[/url].

This mod offers a standalone lore- friendly high quality armor set for both genders which comes in four basic variants within one plugin which makes a total of 20 unique items to choose from for your perfect mashup. The armors work with every female or male body replacer, since they show no skin. For version V2 this armor pack comes with new alternate HD textures which provide a new and interesting look for that set.

This mod is highly modular and mashup friendly, as you can enjoy all of the 5x4 armor parts at once in your game, so you do not have to decide which variant is to be chosen. It contains armor, boots, gloves and two different scarf variants for each of the four sets.

The armor and clothing pieces can be crafted at the TANNING RACK under the "Leather" section and are fully upgradeable and enchantable.

About the looks of it images can say more than thousand words of mine - especially since I have the honour to have some of the greatest screenarchers on the Nexus as regular beta testers for my work. Be sure to check out their remarkable work in the gallery on this front page and in the image section of this mod. I also can recommend to watch the wonderful review videos below which show the armors ingame with different settings.[/size][/color]


[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Video Reviews[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]

[youtube]FsCw7Nn928s[/youtube]
by hodilton

[youtube]rbj2jCrmB7U[/youtube]
by Sidras01

[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Requirements[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]Skyrim 1.9+ is required for this mod to work.[/size][/color]


[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Installation[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]

Download the mod file and extract the file into your skyrim directory, e.g. C:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonskyrimData and say "yes" when being asked to integrate and override or just use NMM.[/size][/color]


[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Un-installation[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]Delete the file via NMM or manually by deleting the files contained in the mod folder within your Skyrim "Textures" folder.[/size][/color]


[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Compatibility[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]The mod has no compatibility issues except with EotW Dovahkiins Journeyman armor V1 - you'll have to decide which one you want.[/size][/color]



[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]The Items and Variants[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JwDjObcl.jpg[/IMG]
by misslexi

[size=+1][color=lightblue]The Dovahkiins Journeyman Noldorian variant offers a noble and protective armor in my established Noldorian colour scheme of blue cloth brown leather and gold and silver steel metal parts.[/size][/color]


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/d2duGpnl.jpg[/IMG]
by misslexi

[size=+1][color=lightblue]The Black variant offers a fine alternative for all thief, rogue or asassin characters and comes with black cloth and leather, accompanied by silver decoratives and steel chainmail.[/size][/color]


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mOA2KlLl.jpg[/IMG]
by maymay1588

[size=+1][color=lightblue]The Autumn Ranger variant shows the colours of an Autumn forest with warm earthly shades of brown and gold and bronze metal parts which makes it an ideal choice for a Ranger in the colourful forests of the Rift or the Whiterun plains.[/size][/color]


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hbqniHql.jpg[/IMG]
by maymay1588

[size=+1][color=lightblue]The Ranger variant offers an ideal choice of colours for Ranger and Marksman characters with its blend of rich green and brown colours, accompanied by corundum metal parts.[/size][/color]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]All of these different parts can be mixed and matched to everyone's liking so you can experiment yourself to find your personal blend of colours for your Dovahkiin.[/size][/color]

[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Credits[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]Credits go to...

- QTA for the base models and parts of the textures of the "Dovahkiin's Jerkin Armor"
- the great brokefoot for his work on the armor meshes
- LeanWolf for the V1 1.2 re-work of the plugin
- someone special for being there and an invaluable inspiration
- Dimon99 for UNP body
- Bethesda for creating the gaming masterpiece Skyrim, Dawnguard and Dragonborn DLC and the HD texture packs
- Professor Tolkien who made a fact-loving lawyer and historician believe in magic again, the day I discovered his unique and ever outstanding work back in 2001
- Peter Jackson and WETA Workshop for being a great inspiration for this mod
- Lana del Rey, Howard Shore, Harry Gregson-Williams, Richard Wagner, Giacomo Puccini and others for helping me through endless hours of modding work

and last but absolutely not least to my fantastic group of friends and beta testers :[/size][/color]

[size=+1][color=lightblue]The gallery on this front page is a tribute to YOU and your contribution, your friendly help and encouragement and as well to your inspiring and outstanding modding and screenarchery work. I would not be modding anymore without you! THANK YOU SO MUCH![/size][/color]


[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Permissions[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]This file is a NEXUS EXCLUSIVE and may not be ported to other sites!!!
You are not allowed to use any assets of this mod whithout my permission.[/size][/color]

[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Gallery[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]Now, after so much reading you really deserve the visual joyride provided by my wonderful Beta testers. Be sure to check out their other work here on the Nexus ( links to their work can be found in the "Credits" section. Enjoy it![/size][/color]

[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Author's note[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]If you like this mod please take a second to show your apprechiation or leave a comment or load up a picture - I'd be really grateful for it, since I have put many hours of work and a lot of determination into it. If you enjoy a mod a few clicks should not be too much to ask for. If you face any issues please let me know, so that we may find a solution.
[/size][/color]
